mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.first_ip AS "firstIp", a.browser_type AS "browserType", a.client AS "client", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.username AS "username", a.phone AS "phone", a.portrait AS "portrait", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.email AS "email", a.userType AS "userType"
mapper.select:
SELECT

ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO w_user( id, first_ip, browser_type, client, nickname, username, phone, portrait, remark, create_date, update_date, email, userType ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{firstIp}, #{browserType}, #{client}, #{nickname}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{portrait}, #{remark}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{email}, #{userType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE w_user SET first_ip = #{firstIp}, browser_type = #{browserType}, client = #{client}, nickname = #{nickname}, username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, portrait = #{portrait}, remark = #{remark}, update_date = #{updateDate}, email = #{email}, userType=#{userType} WHERE id = #{id}
